text: The Sphinx
Long ago, there was an old Pharaoh who was very sick.
The Pharaoh had two sons, Ahtep and Tut.
Ahtep was mean, but Tut was kind.
One day, their father said, "Tut will be the next Pharaoh."
"Thank you, father," said Tut.
"No! I want to be the Pharaoh!" said Ahtep.
Tut loved his brother, so he said, "Ahtep, we can both be the Pharaoh."
"No," said Ahtep, and turned away.
He was very jealous.
That night, in secret, Ahtep ordered his guards to kill his brother.
"Put Tut in the cage with the hungry lion," Ahtep said with a mean smile.
"No! Please!" cried Tut.
But Ahtep walked away.
"Goodbye, brother. Ha, ha, ha!"
However, the guard liked Tut, so they freed him after Ahtep left.
"Shh!" they said.
"Tut, you're the real pharaoh," said one guard.
"Hurry, run away!" said the other.
Tut thanked them and quickly ran from the palace.
He rode a camel all the way to the Great Pyramids.
Finally, he said, "I'm so tired," and lay down in the sand.
Suddenly, the winds began to blow wildly.
"Whoosh...Grrr...ROAR...!"
"Who's there?" cried Tut.
"I'am the Sphinx," said a face in the sand, "and I will guard you."
"Me? Why?" asked Tut.
"You are the Pharaoh!" cried the Sphinx.
"Now dig me out of the sand."
And so Tut began to dig.
Soon people saw him.
"What are you doing?" asked a woman.
"I'm digging the Sphinx out of the sand," he said.
Tut told the people his story.
They believed he was the real Pharaoh, so they helped him.
Tut is the Pharaoh! the people told others.
Soon, the whole city was digging.
After a while, they had freed the Sphinx.
Not long after, Ahtep heard about his brother.
"Tut is alive?" cried Ahtep.
"Not for long. Ha, ha, ha!"
"Sir," said the guards, "what should we do?"
"Let's go see the Sphinx," he said.
Ahtep took his army to the Sphinx.
When Tut saw him, he was sad.
"Ahtep, let's not fight," he said.
"Come, my brother. Give me a hug," said Ahtep.

Tut walked closer, and then Ahtep smiled wickedly and raised 
his knife to kill him.
"No, Ahtep!" cried Tut.
Suddenly, the Sphinx's face began to glow.
It moved, and then it roared.
"Tut is the Pharaoh!" it yelled.
Ahtep was shocked, but he still yelled, "No! I want to be the Pharaoh!"
The Sphinx opened its mouth and grabbed Ahtep with its long tongue ...
SLURP!
And then swallowed him whole.
GULP!
Then the Sphinx spit out the Pharaoh's crown.
"Tut is the Pharaoh!" roared the Sphinx, and Tut put on the crown.
All the people cheered, "Long live the Pharaoh! Long live the Pharaoh!"
Then the Sphinx smiled and turned back into a statue.
